pronunciation.pinyin: bù zi tài dà , róng yì chě zhe dàn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: bu4 zi5 tai4 da4 , rong2 yi4 che3 zhe5 dan4

meanings.value: if you take too big a stride, you could easily rip your balls (catchphrase) (line spoken by actor 葛優|葛优[Ge3 You1] in the 2010 action comedy movie 讓子彈飛|让子弹飞[Rang4 Zi3 dan4 Fei1])
take things one step at a time
